CustomField.formula: if( ApplicationRequestedAmount__c != CertifiedAllocatedAmount__c, true, false) || if( Text(ApplicationEnrollmentStatus__c) != Text(CertifiedEnrollmentStatus__c) , true, false) || if( ApplicationExpectedGraduationDate__c != CertifiedExpectedGraduationDate__c , true, false) || if( ApplicationSchoolProgramOfStudy__c != CertifiedSchoolProgramOfStudy__c , true, false) || if( Text(ApplicationResidency__c) != Text(CertifiedResidency__c) , true, false) || if( Text(ApplicationGradeLevel__c) != Text(CertifiedGradeLevel__c) , true, false)
CustomField.label: (DEPRECATE)Certification Changes
